_comment: Example configuration for Razer Battery Tray Monitor
_comment2: Copy this to config.json and customize as needed

devices.name: BSKV3P 35K
devices.description: Razer Basilisk V3 Pro 35K Gaming Mouse

devices.name: Example Disabled Device
devices.description: Example: Set enabled to false to temporarily disable without removing

_usage_notes.devices: Explicit list of devices to monitor. Each device can be enabled/disabled individually.
_usage_notes.namePatterns: Wildcard patterns (e.g., 'BSK*' matches any device starting with 'BSK'). Supports * at end only.
_usage_notes.refreshInterval: How often to update battery levels (in seconds). Default: 300 (5 minutes). Min: 60 (1 minute).
_usage_notes.batteryThresholds: Percentage thresholds for icon colors. high=green, medium=orange, low=red-orange, below low=red.
_usage_notes.pattern_matching: The app checks namePatterns FIRST, then devices. Devices already matched by patterns don't need to be in the devices array.
_usage_notes.tip: Use Configure-Devices.ps1 for interactive configuration instead of editing manually!
